org.joonegap.samples.nim
Class NIMNeuralNetManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.joonegap.NeuralNetManager
        |
        +--org.joonegap.samples.nim.NIMNeuralNetManager
public class NIMNeuralNetManager
extends NeuralNetManager

A neural network manager for playing NIM.

This neural network extends NeuralNetManager, in order to...

  • Create a uninitialised neural network for playing NIM
  • Register that the first output node means 'play 3 beans', the second means 'play 2 beans', and so on
Based on work by Mitchell Timin.

Method Detail

createUninitializedNeuralNetwork

protected NeuralNet createUninitializedNeuralNetwork()
Description copied from class: NeuralNetManager
Create an uninitialized neural network of the structure you desire.

Clients should not set the network's inputs or outputs, or any monitors, and should not train the network in any way.

Specified by:
createUninitializedNeuralNetwork in class NeuralNetManager
Returns:
a JOONE NeuralNet object

getMeaningOfOutputNodeAt

protected java.lang.Object getMeaningOfOutputNodeAt(int p_iIndex)
Output nodes are numbered such that:

0=1 bean
1=2 beans
2=3 beans

Specified by:
getMeaningOfOutputNodeAt in class NeuralNetManager
Parameters:
p_iIndex - the index of the output node
Returns:
the meaning of that node
